meaningMnemonic: If you have to <kanji>aim</kanji> with your <kanji>attack</kanji>, you're probably <vocabulary>shooting</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>sniping</vocabulary> something with a projectile (like a gun, or something).
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
